title: Tennis Podcast: WTA Finals Preview – record breaking prize money and young players to the fore
text:
The last few years have seen a shift in women’s tennis. While Serena Williams continues to chase a 24th Grand Slam title, she is competing less and less regularly on the WTA Tour, a part-enforced, part-voluntary decision which means she didn’t accumulate enough points to qualify for this year’s season-ending finals.

Nevertheless, in her absence, a number of exciting young players have stepped up and emerged as the winners of the sport’s biggest titles. US Open champion Bianca Andreescu is still a teenager, two-time Grand Slam champion Naomi Osaka is only 22, and World No 1 Ash Barty is just one year older.
description: The last few years have seen a shift in women’s tennis.
